data.message: i have sent you a message but have not answered it. I need help with something :)

replies.message: Hi Nathaly, how can we help assist you? -Meagan

Hi! 
I while ago i changed my lastname on Facebook because i didn't want my real lastname so everyone could see. A few months later i got a message from Facebook saying that i had to change my name on Facebook so i changed it to what had in the first place. Now i wanna change my name on facebook again because i still don't want my real lastname on Facebook but according to Facebook i can't change my name again because i changed it too many times. 
Can i really not change my name more than two times? :)
Hey Nathaly I've changed my name more than twice maybe even more than five times I'm just letting you know that if Facebook doesn't reply back to you

Sebastian Lopez thanks! But if you could do it, why can't i? 😳 
I can't even change my "nickname"

Hi Nathaly. Facebook is a community where people use their authentic identities, so you always know who you're connecting with. This helps keep our community safe.

You may be having trouble changing your name if:

-Your name doesn't follow our name policy
-You changed your name in the last 60 days
-You were previously asked to confirm your name on Facebook
You can learn more about our real name policy here: https://www.facebook.com/help/448505685205813. -Meagan
Facebook that's not helpfull because people say that they have changed their names like ten times and i can't even change mine. I need help!

Exactly! What if you were married more than twice?  What if you legally changed your name for whatever reason you choose?  On the other hand if you really don't want people to see your last name, there are some privacy settings that you can set up, so that nobody sees you or your name unless they are FB friends you have designated.
Rick how do i change the settings so that nobody sees my last name?
what can I do for you just tell me madam whatever you need I would provide for you right away.
I need to change my name on Facebook but they say that i cant :)
